name: Slayers Wonderful
description:
Teenage sorceress Lina Inverse and her bumbling swordsman companion Gourry Gabriev, forever questing for fame, fortune, and foreign food, are once again roaming the countryside looking for adventure. They happen upon a group of bandits, and decide to make an attack, but...Lina's magic doesn't work, Gourry's Sword of Light doesn't work, and the two of them get clobbered. For some reason, the forces of magic are waning, and it's up to Lina and her companions to find the cause and fix it. After all, what's a sorceress without her magic?

Slayers Wonderful is one of several games based on the light novel series written by Hajime Kanzaka and illustrated by Rui Araizumi, better known in the west by its anime adaptions. The game is a Japanese-style RPG in the model of Final Fantasy, and follows Lina, Gourry, and the rest of the familiar cast through their adventure. A key feature of the battle system is the "Feeling System", where the characters' relations and actions will influence their performance in battle. Illustrated dialogue scenes drive the story.
